content: Hi all. I am presently working on the issue #10385. Can someone please tell me if i should place a widget of calendar or should i just add the feature to the search bar? If i have to add a widget where should i add it?

Personally, I would love to have the widget on clicking the dates -

pasted image

@Challa Venkata Raghava Reddy Definitely to make this useful for the most users, there should be a GUI widget. Clicking on the date separators seems like a pretty good way to get to it.

Personally I will also appreciate having it in the search bar, with some syntax like date:2018-10-05.

Let's start with the search bar, since that's less likely to have funny frontend things we have to deal with. Next place after that if we're going to add click targets is probably the dates in the recipient bars.
